title: Rhymes of Passion and Lace
description: This short collection of poetry will put the reason for lace back in passion. Relax and read to put your mind in the place you want to go, before you grab your partner and go there.***The poetry is designed to fit on a Kindle page. Some of the poems may not form the correct shape on smaller screens.Free ReignThose eyes captivateAngelic wings, hallucinateShe moves in slidesLovely swinging glidesUpon tile heels clickHeart races, lips lickedShe moves with graceWearing nothing but laceUpon my very beingShe has free reign on me
author: T.L. Dreamer
